name: PUMP IT UP THE O.B.G –THE 3RD DANCE FLOOR-
summary: O.B.G, ‘Oldies But Goodies’ was developed with a theme based on classic 90’s style, the entire songs were renewed, also the Crazy mode was introduced for the first time as well.
